actions.text: Amendment SA 30 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 34.
Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 26. (consideration: CR S1724-1741; text: CR S1724) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
